name: Extreme Chicken
description:
**WARNING: Title music may damage your speakers. Play at low volume to be safe**

Chicken. It's a refined competition where two vehicles charge head-on towards each other until one veers away in cowardice or they both collide in a brilliant blaze. Some consider it an evolution of the age old duels that would pit one person against another in a  match where defeat would often result in DEATH. Those stakes have never been higher than they are in... EXTREME CHICKEN.

- Face off against endless waves of buses as you make your way around and around a four sided circuit!

- Avoid randomly spawning obstacles that slow you to a crawl and make you look like a fool!

- Listen to one of 3 booty quaking tracks as you drive for your life!

- Rack up the highest score! Nothing can prepare you for what you'll see if you can reach 1,000,000 points!*

---

CONTROLS:

Up Arrow/W - Accelerate

Down Arrow/S - Decelerate/Reverse

Left Arrow/A - Turn Left

Right Arrow/D - Turn Right

E - Brake

---

*The developer cannot guarantee that anything will actually happen if you reach 1,000,000 points.
